title: Bug 4974 Set classpath / output location should be one operation
EB: The setting of classpath / output location should be offered as one operation, similar to the validation process. Additionally, the error message should be improved to say: '/xy/src' cannot be nested in '/xy'
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create a project with 'src' as the source folder and 'bin' as the output location. 2. In the project properties, change the setting to use the project as the source folder and the project as the output location.
